description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans needs one Portable Particle Counter.
full_summary:
**Title**: Portable Particle Counter
=====================================

**procurementNumber**: WS3694158826

**projectStart**: 2022-11-07
**projectEnd**: No end date specified

**tenderDescription**:
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Canada Gulf region requires the supply and delivery of one (1) portable particle counter model 'PAMAS S4031 GO' or equivalent. All tenders are due on 2022-12-02 14:00:00.

**procurementDetails**:

* **procurementMethod**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **procurementCategory**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **nteNoticeType**: Request for Proposal
* **awardCriteria**: Lowest Price
* **languageOfService**: English/French
* **localesOfDelivery**: Moncton
* **culturalAppropriate**: No specification

**contractingAuthority**:

* **contractingEntityName**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **contractingEntityAddress**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **directorContact**: Gillis2, Melanie (SPAC/PSPC)
* **contactEmail**: melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **noticeURL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14665308?extsite=MTQ2NjUzMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

NO FURTHER DETAILS SHOULD BE LEFT AS THIS SOLICITATION HAS EXPIRED.
